node.title: Queenslanders urged to wear masks again as state records 18 community cases of COVID-19
node.alt: Health Minister Yvettte D'Ath speaks to reporters
node.description: Queensland authorities are "actively considering" the return of the mask mandate after 18 new community cases of the virus were recorded in Brisbane's south and north, the Darling Downs, the Gold and Sunshine coasts, West Moreton and Wide Bay.
node.content:
["Queensland has 22 new cases of COVID-19 and\u00a018 of those were detected outside quarantine, Health Minister Yvette D'Ath says.", "The local cases spent up to a week in the community and\u00a0were recorded in Brisbane's south, Brisbane's north, the Darling Downs, the Gold Coast, the Sunshine Coast, West Moreton and the Wide Bay.", "Ms D'Ath said most were acquired while in another state.", "One of the positive cases visited an aged care facility in Holland Park\u00a0and it\u00a0has been locked down as a precaution.", "There are now three confirmed\u00a0cases of Omicron, two of which\u00a0have been infectious while in the community.", "One is a Townsville soldier who had travelled from Newcastle to Brisbane and then Brisbane to Townsville on Monday but Ms D'Ath said he had \"very limited\" exposure in the community.", "Another is a woman from Rochedale South,\u00a0whose infection was recorded yesterday.", "She had travelled from Newcastle\u00a0and was infectious in the community on December 12 and 13.", "The third confirmed Omicron case is a flight crew member who spent no time in the community and is in hotel quarantine.", "\"It is spreading far quicker than Delta.\"", "Most of the new cases were fully vaccinated and\u00a0Chief Health Officer John Gerrard said they were experiencing mild symptoms.", "Dr Gerrard said he had spoken to the doctors looking after\u00a0Omicron cases in the state, who have said\u00a0that their patients were \"well\".", "\"It's a small positive note,\" he said.", "\"These patients are young, they've been vaccinated.", "\"They're small numbers but obviously we need to see larger numbers and we need to see what happens in people who are vulnerable and older.\"", "
Mask mandate being considered
", "Dr Gerrard said health authorities were \"actively considering\"\u00a0reimposing a mask mandate as infections surge in the state.", "In the meantime, he encouraged people to wear them indoors and on public transport and get their vaccine booster doses once eligible.", "He said a mask mandate could help \"slow the spread of the virus\" and give people the chance to get the third dose of a vaccine.", "
More cases expected as more travellers arrive
", "More than 61,000 travellers from interstate hotspots have border passes to enter Queensland.", "\"With all of these people coming from interstate \u2026\u00a0we expect these numbers to keep growing,\" Ms D'Ath said.", "\"Unvaccinated people have a much higher chance of becoming seriously unwell.\""]
